document_data.name: Mass
document_data.mainbody: '''''Mass''''' was a common [[spell]] used by [[wu jen]] in [[Kara-Tur]]. The spell was very rare outside Kara-Tur.
document_data.Effects: This spell allowed a wu jen to manipulate the weight of an item. The item had to be within 60 yards (54 meters) of the wu jen for the spell to work. Manipulating the mass of an item had no effect on the properties of the item. For example, if a wu jen doubled the mass of an arrow, that arrow could still be fired as a regular arrow. The spell was able to affect multiple items at once.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, the spell required [[material component]]s, a [[hummingbird]] feather and the toenail of an [[elephant]].
